name: Doki Doki No Obama
description:
Created for the 2014 Indie Game Maker Contest, Doki Doki No Obama was my attempt to try and rationalize the whole Net Neutrality nightmare, learn some Python, and try and make a game that was both a political satire of the situation while also being a fun comedy/dating sim. It was an adventure, having to learn enough python to make it work, put a game together, and also research some of these key figures... but I did it! With some help from my friend Andrew Flanagan we managed to get submitted with literal minutes to spare in the contest deadline. After a couple years of not being hosted anywhere when the context website went down, it's now home on Itch.io!

Anyway, I hope you have fun.
